DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research trial study gene tumor sample young patient ovarian testicular sex cord stromal tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Genes Samples From Younger Patients With Ovarian Testicular Sex Cord Stromal Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To assess role DICER1 mutation miRNA pathway etiology progression ovarian testicular sex cord stromal tumor . OUTLINE : Archived tumor tissue sample analyze D1CER1 mutation mRNA expression reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction ( RT-PCR ) laser micro dissector . Results correlate medical data , include age diagnosis , diagnosis , pathology report , present symptom , family history , treatment , outcome , length follow-up , available .
